title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 07, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 07, 2020
description:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP reacts to the new developments of the covid outbreak in the NFL. How many games will get postponed this week? Will the NFL consider pushing back the Super Bowl? We're joined by Basketball HoFer Charles Barkley, Ole Miss Head Football Coach Lane Kiffin, and The MMQB's Albert Breer. Plus, Dan remembers the life of Eddie Van Halen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
